      • setCell

        public void setCell(int row,
                    int column,
                    org.newdawn.slick.Color color)
        Sets the cell in the intersection given by the row and the column.
        Parameters:
        row - indicates the row where the cell will be placed.
        column - indicates the column where the cell will be placed.
        color - indicates the color that the cell will have.

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(int row,
                    int column)
        Gets a specific cell of the table.
        Parameters:
        row - indicates the row where the cell is placed.
        column - indicates the column where the cell is placed.
        Returns:
        the cell in the intersection given by the row and the column.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty(int row,
                       int column)
        Determines if a cell is empty.
        Parameters:
        row - indicates the row where the cell is placed.
        column - indicates the column where the cell is placed.
        Returns:
        true if the cell is empty, false otherwise

      • rowIsEmpty

        public boolean rowIsEmpty(int row)
        Determines if an entire row is empty.
        Parameters:
        row - indicates the row to check.
        Returns:
        true if all the cells on the row are empty, false otherwise

      • getCells

        public java.util.Iterator<Cell> getCells()
        Returns an Iterator with all the cells set in the table.
        Returns:
        an iterator of Cell.

      • deleteLines

        public int deleteLines()
        Function that removes all lines on the board. A line is a row with all its cells occupied.
        Returns:
        the number of lines eliminated.
